text:
My daughter is enjoying herself with the staff and learning here. The updates, highlights are
helpful and fun for knowing what they went through and for discussion. The tea session with the teachers are brief enough for some clarity, yet not draggyâ€¦ thank you for the concise session and information

I put both of my children in Little Seeds AMK as I am confident with the school teachers and the school curriculum. I like the way the school conduct lessons, they allow kids to learn through exploration, this is important since children at the age of 2-6 years learn fastest through hands on activities. I would also like to say a BIG thank you to all the teachers in LSP AMK for all the support in educating the next generation!

As a parent of a child in the school, I can feel the energy, passion, warmth and enthusiasm of the teachers (especially from Aunty Susie and Aunty Liu) when it comes to teaching and motivating my child. It is crucial for a childâ€™s growth and development to have good teacher guidance and companionship since they spend most of their time in school. Kudos to the team!

Little Seeds AMK has a wonderfully nurturing environment and we are so glad to have chosen this preschool for our boy. He had been attending since mid 2022. Thankful to Susi, Liu, Samantha, Chiew Ping, Hong Dan, Angela, Megan, Casey and all the teachers and staff for your love and care.

Itâ€™s been exactly two month since my son has joined the school. Though he took some time to warm up to the teachers, the teachers on the other hand have been patient, gentle and caring. I can see from his face that he very much looking forward going to school everyday ! Thanks Aunty Chiew Ping and Yali. ðŸŒ»
